title: What is the relationship between opposition, nature, and disease according to De via libertatis and De motu vitae?
first_phrase: This text is about the importance of discovering one's true will and facilitating their nature to avoid falling into disease. It discusses the conflict as the cause of all phenomena and the universe itself. The author presents how each connection dissolves a more material complex, creating a less material one, and the power of violent passion between two opposites. The last 200 tokens explain how light and warmth arise from the combination of hydrogen and oxygen, love arises from that of man and woman, and dhy'dna, ecstasy, stems from the connection between the self and the non-self. The author warns of the dangers of false gods, religion, ethics, and science, which hinder one's true will.
content: (i ) Nel testo, giuoco di parole intraducibile fra to ease (facilitare, agevolare) e disease (malattia, disturbo): i/ you ease not Nature, she will bring thee to disease. De motu vitae Impara dunque, figlio mio, che tutti i fenomeni sono effetto di un conflitto, cosi come l'universo stesso è un nulla esprimentesi come la differenza di due uguali, o, se vuoi, come il separarsi di Nuith e Hadith ('). Per cui ogni connubio (marriage) scioglie un complesso piú ma- teriale creandone uno meno materiale; e questa è la no- stra via dell'amore, che si eleva d'estasi in estasi. Per- tanto cosi ogni potere violento, ogni coscienza, è l'or- gasmo spirituale di una passione fra due opposti, fra un principio debole e un principio forte. Cosi luce e calo- re scaturiscono dal connubio di idrogeno e ossigeno; l'amore sorge da quello di uomo e donna; dhy'dna, l'esta- si, deriva da quello fra Io e non-Io.
last_phrase: In conclusion, it's important to understand that all conflicts, even those within our own bodies, can be resolved through a deeper understanding of their roots. By learning to ease our bodies and minds, we can prevent disease and achieve a greater sense of well-being. So remember to prioritize your health and strive for balance in all aspects of life.
